name: John Hoskyns' Wiring Diagram, 1974
description:
"Without any political experience, [Hoskyns] dedicated the year of 1977 to analysing what he considered to be wrong with the UK; this was a large part of the Stepping Stones Report. He created this report for the Tory party, working with Norman S. Strauss, then at Unilever. He created a diagram that showed how all these problems were interlinked." â€” https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Hoskyns#The_Stepping_Stones_Report,_1977


Graphviz dot code: https://github.com/jtewright/wiring_diagram
